篿字的基本解释

篿
tuán
圆形的竹器：篿箕。篿匾。

篿
zhuān
用灵草和小竹枝占卜。

篿字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhuān］
［《廣韻》職緣切，平仙，章。］
古代占卜的一种。

篿字的康熙字典解释

【未集上】【竹字部】　篿； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页896第22
【廣韻】度官切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】徒官切，?音團。【說文】圜竹器也。　又【廣韻】職緣切【集韻】【韻會】朱遄切【正韻】朱緣切，?音專。楚人謂折竹卜曰篿。【屈原·離騷】索瓊茅以筳篿。【註】瓊茅，靈草。筳，竹算。楚人結草折竹卜曰篿，蓋本竹算，用之以卜，故因謂卜爲篿，猶今人以籌算數畫也。同?。

篿字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
篿字的起名意思

指圆形的竹器，或用灵草和小竹枝占卜。

Zhu
Basic explanation of words
Zhu
tuán
Round bamboo utensils: Zhuiji. Zhuo plaque.
Zhu
zhuān
Divination with spirit grass and small bamboo branches.

["Guangyun" job margin cut, Pingxian, chapter. ]

[Not set on] [Bamboo Character Department] 　篿; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 896 22
[Guangyun] Duguan cut [Jiyun] [Yunhui] [Zhengyun] Discretionary cut,? Sound group. 【Said the text】Won bamboo ware also.　[Guangyun] Vocational margin cut [Jiyun] [Rhyme meeting] Zhu Dun cut [Zheng Yun] Zhu margin cut,? Sound specialization. The people of Chu said that the bamboo divination was called Zhuo. [Qu Yuan·Lisao] Suo Qiong Mao Yihuan. [Note] Qiongmao, Lingcao.筳, bamboo count. The people of Chu called bamboo divination by knotting grass and folding bamboo, and the bamboo was used for calculation. Therefore, it was called divination as a bamboo divination, and people still use the plan to calculate and draw. with?.
